description: Palmitoleic acid improves the efficacy of anti-TNF-α therapy in inflammatory bowel disease.
Palmitoleic acid reduces expressions of TNF-α in inflamed colon tissues.
Palmitoleic acid reduces expressions of IL-6 in inflamed colon tissues.
Palmitoleic acid significantly upregulates the transcriptional signatures of Akkermansia muciniphila.
Akkermansia muciniphila provides better protection against colitis when orally transferred with POA-reprogrammed gut microbiota.
Anti-TNF-α therapy is used to treat inflammatory bowel diseases.
Crohn's disease is a type of inflammatory bowel disease.
